alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 12:51PM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 0.5 to 3 inches below 6500 feet. With 4 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially across higher elevation roadways and passes. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
